item.title: Help with INTS
item.dc:creator: @Wafflz Wafflz
item.description:
@Wafflz wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12345 && playerRights == D || playerRights >= A) // unequips weapon if your name isn't Kenshin - Kenshin { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield such power"); } class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12346; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12347; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12347; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 650; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dragon Clawz"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Super Strong Claws".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

Good?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with INTS
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

time of rune:

the ID doesn’t change anything… I want to know how to make it a donator only, and admin+…

umm that is server sided… but let me develope a code really fast…
please replace the D with the playerrights required for donator… and that A with the playerrights requireed for an admin…

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12345 && playerRights == D || playerRights >= A) // unequips weapon if your name isn't Kenshin - Kenshin { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield such power"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with INTS
item.dc:creator: @Wafflz Wafflz
item.description:
@Wafflz wrote:

Okay, I’m adding d claws into my server, and just want to know how to make them donator only, and admin+

here’s the ints

Code:
if(i == 12345) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 12346; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 12347; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 12347; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt181 = 650; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Dragon Clawz”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “A pair of Super Strong Claws”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
}

Read full topic
